name: The Receptive
description: The Gate of the Direction of the Self - The power of allowing and receiving direction

channel.name: The Beat
channel.description: The Channel of the Beat - A Design of Being a Keeper of Keys

signal.script: You're being called to receive rather than push. What wants to come through you when you stop forcing?
experiments: Spend 20 minutes in stillness, noticing what arises
Follow the path of least resistance today
Ask for guidance and stay open to unexpected answers

friction.trigger: Resistance to receiving help or direction
friction.script: Your strength includes knowing when to receive. What support have you been refusing?
experiments: Accept help that's been offered to you
Notice where control is costing you flow

breakpoint.script: You're recalibrating your sense of direction. This uncertainty is temporaryâ€”your inner knowing is reorganizing at a deeper level.
experiments: Return to your body through somatic practices
Journal: 'What do I know to be true right now?'
Simplify decisions to yes/no body responses
